summary: A young woman is murdered on an elevator and the only witness is her cat Bidan. Her friend So-yeon brings the cat home and wild and disturbing things begin to happen.
cast: Dong-wook Kim|Ye-ron Kim|Min-Jae Kim|Da-eun Sin|Park Min-Young|Sang-Hyun Park
director: Directors: Seung-wook Byeon (as Seung-Wook Byun), Seung-wook Byeon
title: Go-hyang-i: Jook-eum-eul bo-neun doo gae-eui noon
